title: IESCO notifies 2-day power shutdown programme
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 06 (APP):Islamabad Electric Supply Company (IESCO) on Friday issued 2-day power suspension programme for Saturday and Sunday for various areas of its region due to necessary maintenance and routine development work.
According to IESCO Spokesperson, the power supply of different feeders and grid stations would remain suspended for the period on Saturday from 07:00 AM to 12:00 Noon Islamabad Circle, Ali Pur feeders, Rawalpindi Cantt Circle, Mehboob Shaheed, Park View, Pindi Board, Jail Park, Car Chowk, New Kaliam, Old Kaliam, Jatha Hatial, Bisali, Industrial , Bhal, Ghamti, Jarrar Camp Feeders, Rawalpindi City Circle, T&T Wani, Jhangi, EME Complex, Sector 4-, Shams Colony, Bijnyal, Feeders, , Jhelum Circle, Sohawa Kachheri, Feeders.
On Sunday from 07 AM to 12:00 Noon, Rawalpindi City Circle, T&T Wani, Jhangi, EME Complex, Sector 4-, Shams Colony Feeders, 07:00 AM to 08:30 AM, GSO Circle, Hazro, Nad Topa, Radio Pak Two, Darya Sharif, Shanka, Barzai, Radio Pak One, Shamsabad, Ghorghashti, Lawrencepur, Hattian, Qaziabad, Visa, Maskinabad, Musa, GBC 3, GBHP, Power Channel 1,2 , 3, 4, Shah Dir, Asian Development Scheme, Shafi Chauhan, NASTP Feeders, dated 09 September 2024, 07:00 AM to 12:00 PM Islamabad Circle, H-8/2, I/8-2, NECOP, PC, TDCP, MCM, Gharial, Kohala, Sunny Bank, Rehara, CM Pak Zong, Isolation Hospital Feeders, Rawalpindi Cantt Circle, Dhamiyal I-, Lalkurti, UC Lakhan, Shah Jeevan, Gulshan Saeed, Mehboob Shaheed, Park View, Pindi Board, Jail Park, Car Chowk, Zaraj One, Zaraj Two, Zeta One, IST, Dhok Awan, Mohra Nagyal, Hamayun, Feeders, Rawalpindi City Circle, T&T Wani, Jhangi. , EME Complex, Sector 4-, Shams Colony, Muslim Town, G-15, Katarian, Holy Family, F Block, Bani, Misrial Roadfeeders, Jhelum Circle, Puran, Khokhar, Fatehpur, Sarai Alamgir, Mohalla Shaheedan, Galiana, Kantrila, Bhai Khan, Kalia, Pind Fateh Khan, Ajmal Shaheed, F-7 Kachhari, Abbaspora, Pakhwal, F-9 Chak Daulat, Jakar, Feeders, Chakwal Circle, Dhoda, Feeders and surrounding areas.
